sense.def:
Kdor je
hostile
, je neljubezniv in napadalen.

seg.quote: Frank was a reserved, almost hostile person.
I was in a depressed and hostile mood.

sense.def:
To be hostile to someone or something
pomeni ne strinjati se s kom ali čim ali ne odobravati nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a new government that is hostile to us.

sense.def:
Okoliščine in pogoji, ki so
hostile
, človeku otežijo, da bi nekaj dosegel.

seg.quote: ...the problem of running machinery in hostile environments.
